alert.note: Alert for Hickman; Humphreys; Perry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 12:18PM CST until January 01 at 12:45PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Perry County in Middle Tennessee... Southern Humphreys County in Middle Tennessee... Western Hickman County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 1245 PM CST. * At 1218 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Parsons, or 12 miles northwest of Linden, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Linden, Lobelville, Mousetail Landing State Park, Bucksnort, Pleasantville and I-40 Near The Tennessee River. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 136 and 155. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for Middle Tennessee.
